title: Subject matter
summary: Article 1 defines the purpose and scope of the European Union Artificial Intelligence Act. It seeks to ensure a high level of protection of health, safety, and fundamental rights while supporting the uptake of trustworthy AI within the internal market. It establishes harmonised rules for AI systems, including prohibitions, transparency obligations, requirements for high-risk AI, and governance provisions, alongside measures intended to support innovation, especially for small and medium-sized enterprises.
